user_query: I'm writing an article about the correlation between market sentiment and website traffic. Can you fetch the Fear and Greed index for the past month and the visit data for google.com? I want to analyze the relationship between these two factors.

TaskList.description: Fetch the Fear and Greed index data for the past month.
Fetch the website visit data for google.com for the past month.
Analyze the correlation between the Fear and Greed index and the website traffic data.
